Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6104 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-15
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6104 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.6.1-15. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.6.1-15, affected by CVE-2024-6104
